    • Method Detail

      • getPromotion

        public int getPromotion​()
        Returns:
        Returns the piece that will be obtained as the result of the promotion. If this is not a promoting move Chessboard.NONE is returned.

      • getCoordinates

        public int[] getCoordinates​()
        Describes the move in terms of board indices in the following order: from_x,from_y,to_x,to_y. Example: move Ng1-f3 is represented as 6 0 5 2.
        Returns:
        Returns the piece movement

      • setAlgebraicNotaion

        public void setAlgebraicNotaion​(boolean algebraic)
        Sets the type for printing moves. Algebraic (Nf3) or Full (g1-f3).
        Parameters:
        algebraic - use algebraic notation

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString​()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
